stratagems.name: COMMAND RE-ROLL
stratagems.fluff: A great commander can bend even the vagaries of fate and fortune to their will, the better to ensure victory
stratagems.when:
In any phase, just after you have made a Hit',
roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an
Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test,
a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the
dice to determine the number of attacks made with a
weapon, for an attack, model or unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

stratagems.name: COUNTER-OFFENSIVE
stratagems.fluff:
In close-quarters combat, the slightest hesitation
can leave an opening for a swift foe to exploit.
stratagems.when:
Fight phase, just after an enemy unit
has fought.
stratagems.target:
One unit from your army that is within
Engagement Range of one or more enemy units
and that has not already been selected to fight
this phase.

stratagems.name: EPIC CHALLENGE
stratagems.fluff:
The legends of the 41st Millennium are replete with
deadly duels between mighty champions.
stratagems.when:
Fight phase, when a Character unit from
your army that is within Engagement Range of one or
more Attached units is selected to fight.
stratagems.target: One Character model in your unit.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, all melee
attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION]
ability (pg 26).

stratagems.name: INSANE BRAVERY
stratagems.fluff:
Indifferent to their own survival, these warriors hold
their ground against seemingly impossible odds.
stratagems.when:
Battle-shock step of your Command
phase, just before you take a Battle-shock test
for a unit from your army (pg 11).
stratagems.target:
A unit from your army that must take a
Battle-shock test.
stratagems.effect:
Your unit automatically passes that
Battle-shock test.
stratagems.restrictions:
You cannot use this Stratagem
more than once per battle.

stratagems.name: GRENADE
stratagems.fluff:
Priming their hand-held projectiles, these warriors
draw back and hurl death into the enemy’s midst.
stratagems.target:
One Grenades unit from your army that is
not within Engagement Range of any enemy units
and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect:
Select one enemy unit that is not within
Engagement Range of any units from your army and
is within 8" of and visible to your Grenades unit.
Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1
mortal wound.

stratagems.name: TANK SHOCK
stratagems.fluff:
Ramming the foe with a speeding vehicle may be an
unsubtle tactic, but it is a murderously effective one.
stratagems.target: One Vehicle unit from your army.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, after your unit
ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within
Engagement Range of it, then select one melee
weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of
D6 equal to that weapon’s Strength characteristic.
If that Strength characteristic is greater than that
enemy unit’s Toughness characteristic, roll two
additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1
mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.name: RAPID INGRESS
stratagems.fluff:
Be it cunning strategy, potent technology or
supernatural ritual, there are many means by which a
commander may hasten their warriors’ onset.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
stratagems.effect:
Your unit can arrive on the battlefield
as if it were the Reinforcements step of your
Movement phase.
stratagems.restrictions:
You cannot use this Stratagem to
enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a
battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

stratagems.name: FIRE OVERWATCH
stratagems.fluff: A hail of wildfire can drive back advancing foes.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase,
just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy
unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or
Charge move.
stratagems.target:
One unit from your army that is within 24" of
that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if
it were your Shooting phase.
stratagems.effect: If that enemy unit is visible to your unit, your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
stratagems.restrictions:
You cannot target a Titanic unit
with this Stratagem. Until the end of the phase,
each time a model in your unit makes a ranged
attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required
to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking
weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers. You can
only use this Stratagem once per turn.

stratagems.name: GO TO GROUND
stratagems.fluff:
Seeking salvation from incoming fire, warriors hurl
themselves into whatever cover they can find.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an
enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target:
One Infantry unit from your army that was
selected as the target of one or more of the attacking
unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, all models in
your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the
Benefit of Cover (pg 44).

stratagems.name: SMOKESCREEN
stratagems.fluff:
Even the most skilled marksmen struggle to hit targets
veiled by billowing screens of smoke.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an
enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target:
One Smoke unit from your army that was
selected as the target of one or more of the attacking
unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, all models in your
unit have the Benefit of Cover (pg 44) and the Stealth
ability (pg 20).

stratagems.name: HEROIC INTERVENTION
stratagems.fluff:
Voices raised in furious war cries, your warriors surge
forth to meet the enemy’s onslaught head-on.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an
enemy unit ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target:
One unit from your army that is within 6"
of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare
a charge against that enemy unit if it were your
Charge phase.
stratagems.effect:
Your unit now declares a charge that targets
only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as
if it were your Charge phase.
stratagems.restrictions:
You can only select a Vehicle unit
from your army if it is a Walker. Note that even if
this charge is successful, your unit does not receive
any Charge bonus this turn (pg 29).
